modName: Blue or Red Ebony - DELETED - DELETED
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=6]INSTALLATION[/size][/u][/b][/center]
1. Go into the Ebony Folder
2. Go into the Blood folder [size=4]or [/size]BlueGreen folder
3. Put the textures folder into your skyrim data folder
4. Launch the game



Very simple just because I'm still learning how to make my own mods, soon I will make 3d model meshes


[b][size=4]The blue armor looks more blue/green in better lighting!![/size][/b]
author: User_35157905
